messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Wandering around, I got hungry, so
I ate some wild mushrooms...They gave me gas, and now I can’t
stop burping! Bluurrf!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Bleff! Hurk!
I think...I’m getting better...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I hear there’s a Pokémon that has
mushrooms growing on its back.Not around here, somewhere far away.
I wonder if they taste any good?
